page.title: 04 BOARDING LIFE IN BRUTON
page.content: AT JUNIOR HOUSE WE GET UP AT 7.15. THEN WE GET WASHED. AFTERWARDS WE GO DOWNSTAIRS AND HAVE A HOUSE MEETING AND GO DOWN TO SCHOOL FOR BREAKFAST. AT 9.00AM WE GO TO ASSEMBLY. IF WE HAVE SPORTS WE GET OUR KIT READY. WE HAVE ONE 15 MINUTE BREAK AND A BREAK FOR LUNCH. THEN IN THE MORNING WE GET THREE LESSONS FOR 35 - 40 MINUTES EACH. AFTER BREAK WE GET TWO LESSONS AND THEN AFTER LUNCH WE GET 3 LESSONS. THEN IT IS THE END OF SCHOOL. AFTER SCHOOL WE GO TO THE BOARDING HOUSE AND THEN WE PLAY TENNIS OR FOOTBALL TILL WE HAVE TO GO TO TEA. THEN AFTER TEA WE HAVE PREP. AFTER PREP WE GO BACK TO THE BOARDING HOUSE AND PLAY RUGBY TILL SUPPER, THEN WE GO TO BED AND WE READ FOR A SHORT TIME AND TALK.
